TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleInformation extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides information about the current visual style of the operating system.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This class exposes `static` properties that provide details about the current visual style of the operating system.
## Examples The following code example displays the values of the VisualStyleInformation properties in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
[!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleInformation#0](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.windows.forms.v_6_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleInformation#0](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.windows.forms.v_6_1.vb)] [!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleInformation#0](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.windows.forms.v_6_1.cs)]

Docs.summary: Gets the author of the current visual style.
Docs.value: A string that specifies the author of the current visual style if visual styles are enabled; otherwise, an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property checks the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleInformation.IsEnabledByUser%2A> property internally.

Docs.summary: Gets the color scheme of the current visual style.
Docs.value: A string that specifies the color scheme of the current visual style if visual styles are enabled; otherwise, an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks The Windows XP visual style provides three color schemes. This property returns "NormalColor" if the blue color scheme is active, "HomeStead" if the olive green color scheme is active, and "Metallic" if the silver color scheme is active.

Docs.summary: Gets the company that created the current visual style.
Docs.value: A string that specifies the company that created the current visual style if visual styles are enabled; otherwise, an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property checks the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleInformation.IsEnabledByUser%2A> property internally.

Docs.summary: Gets the color that the current visual style uses to indicate the hot state of a control.
Docs.value: If visual styles are enabled, the used to paint a highlight on a control in the hot state; otherwise, <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.ButtonHighlight%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property checks the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleInformation.IsEnabledByUser%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.IsSupported%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties internally.

Docs.summary: Gets the copyright of the current visual style.
Docs.value: A string that specifies the copyright of the current visual style if visual styles are enabled; otherwise, an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property checks the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleInformation.IsEnabledByUser%2A> property internally.

Docs.summary: Gets a description of the current visual style.
Docs.value: A string that describes the current visual style if visual styles are enabled; otherwise, an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property checks the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleInformation.IsEnabledByUser%2A> property internally.

Docs.summary: Gets the display name of the current visual style.
Docs.value: A string that specifies the display name of the current visual style if visual styles are enabled; otherwise, an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property checks the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleInformation.IsEnabledByUser%2A> property internally.

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the user has enabled visual styles in the operating system.
Docs.value: if the user has enabled visual styles in an operating system that supports them; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Users can enable visual styles in the **Appearance** tab of the **Display** option in Control Panel. This property checks the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleInformation.IsSupportedByOS%2A> property internally.

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the operating system supports visual styles.
Docs.value: if the operating system supports visual styles; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Visual styles are supported only on Windows XP Home Edition, Windows XP Professional, and Windows Server 2003.

Docs.summary: Gets the minimum color depth for the current visual style.
Docs.value: The minimum color depth for the current visual style if visual styles are enabled; otherwise, 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property checks the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleInformation.IsEnabledByUser%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.IsSupported%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties internally.

Docs.summary: Gets a string that describes the size of the current visual style.
Docs.value: A string that describes the size of the current visual style if visual styles are enabled; otherwise, an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property returns "NormalSize", "LargeFonts" or "ExtraLargeFonts". This property checks the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleInformation.IsEnabledByUser%2A> property internally.

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the current visual style supports flat menus.
Docs.value: if visual styles are enabled and the current visual style supports flat menus; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property checks the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleInformation.IsEnabledByUser%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.IsSupported%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties internally.

Docs.summary: Gets the color that the current visual style uses to paint the borders of controls that contain text.
Docs.value: If visual styles are enabled, the that the current visual style uses to paint the borders of controls that contain text; otherwise, <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.ControlDarkDark%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property specifies the border color of controls such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>. This property checks the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleInformation.IsEnabledByUser%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.IsSupported%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties internally.

Docs.summary: Gets a URL provided by the author of the current visual style.
Docs.value: A string that specifies a URL provided by the author of the current visual style if visual styles are enabled; otherwise, an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property checks the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleInformation.IsEnabledByUser%2A> property internally.

Docs.summary: Gets the version of the current visual style.
Docs.value: A string that indicates the version of the current visual style if visual styles are enabled; otherwise, an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property checks the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleInformation.IsEnabledByUser%2A> property internally.
